traits.title: Design is just as important as the code
traits.quote: We spend so much time writing beautiful code and top-notch algorithms, the UI deserves just as much respect.

hobby.intro: What do I do in my free time?
title: Obviously
I have other hobbies too
hobby.subtitle: And they come in handy

hobbies.title: Aviation
hobbies.description: My passion for aviation reflects an appreciation for complex systems, precision, and safety. I understand the importance of structure—and when rules are not meant to be bent.

hobbies.title: Music
hobbies.description: On the other hand, enhances my ability to think creatively and recognize patterns across senses. I often work intuitively and fast once I sense the bigger picture.

hobbies.title: Hiking
hobbies.description: Hiking builds patience and endurance, skills I rely on when solving complex problems and staying focused through long development processes.

intro.title: Hi,  I’m Deyan - a full stack developer who turns ideas into polished digital products
intro.subtitle: From GO backend and React UIs to Swift-driven apps, I write code that feels fast, reliable and I experiment different practices and designs.
